document.full_text: barry callebaut , which makes chocolate for nestle  and hershey , expects to outpace the market in the second half of its fiscal year despite unrest in the top cocoa growing ivory coast region.
document.title: barry callebaut unfazed by ivory coast cocoa fears
lines_and_colors: barry callebaut , which makes chocolate for nestle  and hershey , expects to outpace the market in the second half of its fiscal year despite unrest in the top cocoa growing ivory coast region.
